original_text: And as they came down from the mountain, he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen, till the Son of man were risen from the dead.
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 경고하시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And as they came down from the mountain
that they should tell no man
till the Son of man were risen from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지니라
